name: Freeflow
description: In very early development. Movement techniques similar to Beatrun, with more focus on speed.
creator: NDM Development

name: Parkour Unleashed
description: Absolute hidden gem of a game. The gameplay isnt amazing, and it's quite lacking in content, but there is a full, high-quality map to explore, and many staple features like time trials. Definitely give it a try if you haven't.
creator: Just_Drak (@Bernardoinfo)

name: Exordium
description: Almost predating PARKOUR Legacy, this is one of the first Parkour projects to date. Heavily based off of the Mirror's Edge series, this game has a full gearless moveset and a fully traversable map. It contains time trials, and a 'bag hunting' mode.
creator: Pumpkin Head Studios

name: Faithful
description: A brand new game by development group Xource Horizon. Seems to be heavily based on Mirror's Edge/Beatrun, like their other games. Let's hope this one doesn't get cancelled.
creator: Xource Horizon

name: Chain
description: An in development parkour game inspired by the Mirrors Edge franchise. Very grounded game currently planned to have a playtest December 26th.
creator: End Point Development

name: Rinnox
description: Surrealistic movement emphasizing speed, similar to UPG's gameplay. In active development but currently private.
creator: Dream's Entertainment

name: Freefall Catalyst
description: Decently faithful recreation of Mirror's Edge: Catalyst. Not the greatest, but definitely worth a try if you haven't already.
creator: Sypsee

name: Last Sunrise
description: Less of a pure parkour game and more of a survival game, inspired mainly by the Dying Light series.
creator: WHAT THE GAMES Inc
